name: Know Pokemon
title: Know Pokemon
description: A web application that helps you search and know about any pokemon e.g. Pikachu, butterfree & many more.

name: Vaccine Guru
title: Visit Vaccine Guru
description: A web application that helps you find and book covid-19 vaccines in India for allowed age-groups.

name: Next.js Enzyme Boilerplate
title: Visit Next.js Enzyme Boilerplate
description: A boilerplate for next.js with scss and enzyme testing. It includes a basic layout, header, footer, and a basic style guide.

name: SpaceX Launch Tracker
title: Visit SpaceX Launch Tracker
description: A Responsive web application that tracks SpaceX launches. User can filter results by launch year, success, or date.

name: Netflix Clone
title: Visit Netflix Clone
description: A web application that helps you find movies and TV shows similar to Netflix.

name: Weather Info
title: Visit Weather Info
description: Simple Weather application that shows the weather of a city. User can search for a city and get the weather information.

name: Courier Tracker
title: Courier Tracker is under development
description: Courier Tracker helps find the status of your courier. User can search for a courier and get the status of the courier.
